channel.description: Recent content in conferences on MiR Community

item.title: My R is your R too
item.description: My R is your R too While the R community has made strides in increasing the representation and participation for women and users from underrepresented regions, there are still members of the R community that have expressed desires for a more inclusive space in addition to these strides. In addition, there are unique challenges that underrepresented R users experience in their respective workspaces or academic environments.
